name: Endless Service
description:
SGDC Game Jam U Submission (2/17/2023 - 2/19/2023)

Work in a fast food restaurant that serves a slab of meat, fried chicken, and/or a lobster tail to an infinite horde of zombies customers to satiate their hunger. Don't give them too much or too little or else they won't leave you alone! Serve them as fast as possible to keep them from knocking on your plexiglass shield separating you from them. Otherwise, you'll be their meal!

Controls:

  • Click the button below a zombie to send the items you carry
  • Click on the buttons on the bottom of the screen to navigate between the different stations
  • Click on the trash icon to dispose of all the items you are carrying.
  • Click on an icon on a station to cook (the station specific foodstuff)
    • Click again when the top progress bar is done to grab it [Max 3, excess is disposed].
    • If the second progress bar reaches 0, the food is burnt and you will not be able to carry it when grabbed

Station Service:

  • Grill -> Meat
  • Fryer -> Chicken
  • Steamer -> Lobster

Dev Keybinds (for fun):

  • Shift+Alt+Backspace -> Instant Lose
  • Shift+Backspace -> Lose 100 health
  • Shift+P -> Play Damage Sound

Don't mind the Windows warning, I still haven't found a way to put valid credentials so it wouldn't be marked as suspicious.
